word:
Less Preaching, More Teaching. 

     ELDER FARNSWORTH.--GOING BACK TO SOMETHING YOU SAID HERE IN THE FIRST PART OF YOUR REMARKS, ABOUT OUR HAVING TOO MUCH PREACHING AT OUR CAMP-MEETINGS; HAVE YOU ANYTHING TO SUGGEST? FOR INSTANCE, THAT WE CUT OFF A PART OF THE PREACHING SERVICE? HAVE YOU ANYTHING TO SUGGEST IN 


                        -41- 

REFERENCE TO THE WAY WE SHOULD FILL IN THIS VACANCY?
